nodes.text: Admiral Garrus Tharydine was the Imperial Commander who oversaw the occupation of Mon Calamari. It was him who carried out the Emperor's orders to destroy three cities floating on the planet's surface when local resistance was formed on the planet. Instead of ending the Mon Calamari Resistance, it gave Dac's population a reason for open revolt and eventually resulted in the liberation of the planet from the oppression of the Galactic Empire.
